Thanks for the upload! It was a bit of a challenge to find the original untouched ROM's. Many other sites and other torrents had modified ROMs, but yours are the original North American ones. To verify, I removed the first 16 bytes (header) then calculated the MD5 hashes and compared with the listings at dorando.emuverse.com.

Super Mario Bros. 1 (16-).nes: 8E3630186E35D477231BF8FD50E54CDD (http://dorando.emuverse.com/html/super-mario-bros.html)
Super Mario Bros. 2 (16-).nes: CCD25B4FA7ACDDEF38D75212AE0E5432 (http://dorando.emuverse.com/html/super-mario-bros-2.html)
Super Mario Bros. 3 (16-).nes: B76F978AD3076EA67F2B0ACA7399C9E9 (http://dorando.emuverse.com/html/super-mario-bros-3.html)
